text: Saiful Islam Badal is a Bangladeshi cinematographer. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography twice, for the films Aha! (2007) and Mrittika Maya (2013). ==Selected films== * Bachelor - 2004 * Mad_e in Bangladesh - 2007 * Aha! - 2007 * The Floating Man - 2012 * Mrittika Maya - 2013 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Saiful Islam Badal
